column5: Develop the theoretical and practical managerial skills you need for a successful career in the headquarters, stores and supply chains of the retail industry.This course is for graduates with a degree in any subject. We’ve combined our leading research with our industry partners’ experience to design content relevant to contemporary retailing. You’ll develop the knowledge and skills leaders need to succeed in the rapidly changing retailing industry.You’ll learn about things like:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
